name: Slimy Blimey
description:
2D Action school project game where you play as a slime figure who is trying to fight it's way out of the dungeon.

1 Level with tutorial.
2 Enemies.
1 Boss.
Easter eggs.
Ending.

Max Niskasaari - Art & Animation
Max's Artstation: https://www.artstation.com/mazzziboi
Max's Instagram: Mazzz_art

Jere Juntunen / JereJ_Dev - Programming & Music & Level design
Jere's Instagram: JereJ_Dev

Aaro Vanhatalo - Game design & Production
